name: DVDLink.ca
overview:
Movies and Games rental site promises latest movies and games delivered at the doorstep New website offers one of a kind service including movies and games in one package cost.

With the rate of movie goers increasing by the minute it is only natural that Movies and Games rental stores have mushroomed online. However, the trend of home movie watching has caught on with the result that many sites offer lucrative packages offering movie rental services. Out of these services, www.dvdlink.ca promises to stand out. They have a single package that includes Games and Movie rental services thereby saving on costs and eliminating the need for an additional account.

DVDLink.ca has a list of all the latest movies and games that are available from new releases to classics. There are thousands of movie titles available on the site and users can pick their favorite movies as they wish. There are also many popular Bollywood movies available on the site.

The site differentiates itself through its two in one package that includes games and movie rentals. A user of their service can create their own list of their favorite movies or games and place them in the online rental queue. As per site recommendations queues can contain as many as 100 movies at a single time. As one queue gets over the user can keep adding on more movies of choice which will be delivered in the next batch. Users can also choose to keep these movies as long as they want. Delivery of the movies or games is free of cost. There are no late fees that get charged no matter how long a customer keeps the movie or game.

DVDLink.ca has a 14 day free trial in place where users can test the siteâ€™s services for a 14 day period free of cost. 2 movies at one time and once the user opts in for the packages then shipping begins on the number of movies as specified in the package. The site has various plans and packages in place, such as the Silver, Gold and Platinum which start from as low as $9.95/month.

The customer support system of DVDLink.ca Canada is robust with the store being open 24 hours 365 days of the year. However, their services are operational only in Canada.

To know more about the site visit them at: http://www.dvdlink.ca/
